quote.issuer_name: Wai Yuen Tong Medicine Holdings Ltd.
quote.nm: Wai Yuen Tong Medicine Holdings Ltd.
quote.summary: Wai Yuen Tong Medicine Holdings Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the production and sales of pharmaceutical products. The Company operates through three segments. The Production and Sale of Chinese Pharmaceutical and Health Food Products segment is mainly engaged in the manufacture, processing and sale of traditional Chinese medicine in China and Hong Kong. This segment also provides Chinese medicines under the brand Wai Yuen Tong and products manufactured with traditional prescriptions, as well as traditional Chinese medicine services and management and promotion services. The Production and Sale of Western Pharmaceutical and Health Food Products segment is engaged in the processing and sales of Western pharmaceutical products and personal care products under the brands Madame Pearl’s and Pearl’s. The Property Investment segment is engaged in investment in commercial properties for rental income.
